00133   class VCommandSwitch{
00134   public:
00135     char shortname;               
00136     std::string longname;         
00137     std::string helptext;         
00138     std::string parameter;        
00139 
00140     VCommandSwitch(char short_name, const std::string& long_name,
00141                    const std::string& help_text, const std::string& par) :
00142       shortname(short_name), longname(long_name), helptext(help_text), 
00143       parameter(par) {}
00145     virtual ~VCommandSwitch() {}
00147     virtual int Process(const char* arg) = 0;
00148   };
00149   
00155   template<class Action> class CommandSwitch : public VCommandSwitch{
00156     Action do_action;
00157   public:
00158     CommandSwitch(char short_name, const std::string& long_name,
00159                   const std::string& help_text, const std::string& par,
00160                   Action action) : 
00161       VCommandSwitch(short_name, long_name, help_text, par), 
00162       do_action(action) {}
00163     virtual ~CommandSwitch() {}
00164     virtual int Process(const char* arg);
00165   };
00166   
00168   struct OrderCommandSwitchPointers{
00169     bool operator()(VCommandSwitch* a, VCommandSwitch* b);
00170   };
00171 
00172   typedef std::set<VCommandSwitch*, OrderCommandSwitchPointers> SwitchSet;
00173   SwitchSet _switches; 
00174 };
00175 
00176 //templates must be defined in header
00177 template<class Action> 
00178 int ConfigHandler::AddCommandSwitch(char shortname,
00179                                     const std::string& longname,
00180                                     const std::string& helptext,
00181                                     Action action,
00182                                     const std::string& parameter)
00183 {
00184   //Make sure both shortname and longname aren't empty
00185   if(shortname == ' ' && longname == ""){
00186     std::cerr<<"Error: At least one of shortname and longname must be non-empty for switches!"<<std::endl;
00187     return -1;
00188   }
00189   //Make sure there isn't already a registered switch  with the same keys
00190   for( SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); it++){
00191     if( shortname != ' ' && shortname == (*it)->shortname){
00192       std::cerr<<"Switch already registered with shortname '"
00193                <<shortname<<"'"<<std::endl;
00194       return -2;
00195     }
00196     else if( longname != "" && longname == (*it)->longname){
00197       std::cerr<<"Switch already registered with longname \""
00198                <<longname<<"\""<<std::endl;
00199       return -3;
00200     }
00201   }
00202   _switches.insert(new CommandSwitch<Action>(shortname, longname, helptext,
00203                                              parameter, action) );
00204   return 0;
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 template<class Action> inline
00209 int ConfigHandler::CommandSwitch<Action>::Process(const char* arg)
00210 {
00211   return do_action(arg);
00212 }

00215 //load a saved parameter list
00216 template<class T> inline
00217 bool ConfigHandler::LoadCreateParameterList(T*& par, 
00218                                             std::string key, 
00219                                             bool registerme)
00220 {
00221   if(!par){
00222     boost::shared_ptr<VParameterNode> ptr(par = new T);
00223     //..par = ptr.get();
00224     _deleter.push_back(ptr);
00225   }
00226   return LoadParameterList(par, key, registerme);
00227 }
00228 
00229 template<class T> inline 
00230 bool ConfigHandler::LoadParameterList(T* par,
00231                                       std::string key,
00232                                       bool registerme)
00233 {
00234   bool err=1;
00235   if(key == "")
00236     key = par->GetDefaultKey();
00237   if(registerme)
00238     RegisterParameter(key, *par);
00239   if(_saved_cfg != "")
00240     err = !(par->ReadFromFile(_saved_cfg.c_str(), key, true));
00241   return err;
00242 }
